title: My Life After Now
description: Lucy just had the worst week ever. Seriously, mega bad. And suddenly, it's all too muchâ€”she wants out. Out of her house, out of her head, out of her life. She wants to be a whole new Lucy. So she does something the old Lucy would never dream of.And now her life will never be the same. Now, how will she be able to have a boyfriend? What will she tell her friends? How will she face her family?Now her life is completely different...every moment is a gift. Because now she might not have many moments left.
author: Jessica Verdi
